content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":135911,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと少しかぶる。","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s a slight overlap with Rance."},{"lineNumber":135912,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、それだけの話。","translatedEnglishLine":"That's all there is to it."},{"lineNumber":135913,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"..............\""},{"lineNumber":135914,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふと、窓の外から常と変わらぬ","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, from the window, the usual unchanged"},{"lineNumber":135915,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物界の空を眺める。","translatedEnglishLine":"I gaze at the sky of the demon world."},{"lineNumber":135916,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お父様……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Father..."},{"lineNumber":135917,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全て、終わりましたよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Everything is over.\""},{"lineNumber":135918,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや、ホーネット様、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Lady Hornet,"},{"lineNumber":135919,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな所にいらっしゃったのですか」","translatedEnglishLine":"you were here in such a place.\""},{"lineNumber":135920,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、サテラ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Satera...\""},{"lineNumber":135921,"originalJapaneseLine":"「少し……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just a little..."},{"lineNumber":135922,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まどろんでいました」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was dozing off.\""},{"lineNumber":135923,"originalJapaneseLine":"「父が亡くなり……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Father passed away..."},{"lineNumber":135924,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次の魔王が美樹様となり……","translatedEnglishLine":"the next Demon King became Lady Miki..."},{"lineNumber":135925,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリスが謀反を起こし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kebris rebelled...\""},{"lineNumber":135926,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦って、戦って、戦って……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We fought, fought, and fought...\""},{"lineNumber":135927,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日、ようやくそれが終わった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Today, it finally ended."},{"lineNumber":135928,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それが、どこか信じられなくて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, I still can’t believe it...\""},{"lineNumber":135929,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Already..."},{"lineNumber":135930,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦後処理も一段落がつきました」","translatedEnglishLine":"the post-war arrangements have settled down."},{"lineNumber":135931,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王の後継者は美樹様となり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Miki became the successor of the Demon King,"},{"lineNumber":135932,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後は美樹様がそれを拒むも受けるも自由」","translatedEnglishLine":"and from now on, Lady Miki is free to accept or refuse it."},{"lineNumber":135933,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ようやく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At last..."},{"lineNumber":135934,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ようやく私は父の遺志を叶えることが出来ました」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have finally been able to fulfill my father’s will.\""},{"lineNumber":135935,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王となることを求められた私……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was asked to become the Demon King..."},{"lineNumber":135936,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな私の友となることを求められた貴方」","translatedEnglishLine":"and you were asked to become my friend."},{"lineNumber":135937,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これで……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With this..."},{"lineNumber":135938,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私達の役目は本当の意味で終えました」","translatedEnglishLine":"our role has truly come to an end.\""},{"lineNumber":135939,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとう、サテラ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you, Satera."},{"lineNumber":135940,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方の仕事も終わりです」","translatedEnglishLine":"Your work is also done.\""},{"lineNumber":135941,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここまで私に付き従ってくれたこと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For following me up to this point,"},{"lineNumber":135942,"originalJapaneseLine":"　感謝の言葉にたえません」","translatedEnglishLine":"I cannot express enough gratitude.\""},{"lineNumber":135943,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……そんな、言い方……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh... that way of saying it..."},{"lineNumber":135944,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まるで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s as if...\""},{"lineNumber":135945,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あ、いえ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ah, no."},{"lineNumber":135946,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もったいない、お言葉です……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Your words are too much...\""},{"lineNumber":135947,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Satera...\""},{"lineNumber":135948,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これから私達は、どう生きていくべきか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From now on, how we should live,"},{"lineNumber":135949,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それを探さねばなりません」","translatedEnglishLine":"we must seek that out.\""},{"lineNumber":135950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Still..."},{"lineNumber":135951,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の傍に居てくれますか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"will you stay by my side?\""},{"lineNumber":135952,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……っ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...!\""},{"lineNumber":135953,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい！　もちろんですとも！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes! Of course!\""},{"lineNumber":135954,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe...\""},{"lineNumber":135955,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、行きましょうか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, shall we go?"},{"lineNumber":135956,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだまだ仕事は沢山ありますから」","translatedEnglishLine":"There is still plenty of work to do.\""},{"lineNumber":135957,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes!\""},{"lineNumber":135958,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":135959,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":135960,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが城の図書室に遊びに来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance had come to visit the castle’s library."}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s a slight overlap with Rance.
That's all there is to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと、窓の外から常と変わらぬ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, from the window, the usual unchanged
I gaze at the sky of the demon world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな所にいらっしゃったのですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were here in such a place."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の魔王が美樹様となり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the next Demon King became Lady Miki...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスが謀反を起こし……」
「今日、ようやくそれが終わった。
それが、どこか信じられなくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, I still can’t believe it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦後処理も一段落がつきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the post-war arrangements have settled down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王の後継者は美樹様となり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Miki became the successor of the Demon King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後は美樹様がそれを拒むも受けるも自由」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and from now on, Lady Miki is free to accept or refuse it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく私は父の遺志を叶えることが出来ました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have finally been able to fulfill my father’s will."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王となることを求められた私……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was asked to become the Demon King...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな私の友となることを求められた貴方」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and you were asked to become my friend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達の役目は本当の意味で終えました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: our role has truly come to an end."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方の仕事も終わりです」
「ここまで私に付き従ってくれたこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For following me up to this point,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 感謝の言葉にたえません」
もったいない、お言葉です……」
「これから私達は、どう生きていくべきか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From now on, how we should live,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを探さねばなりません」
私の傍に居てくれますか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will you stay by my side?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい！　もちろんですとも！」
まだまだ仕事は沢山ありますから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is still plenty of work to do."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが城の図書室に遊びに来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance had come to visit the castle’s library.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
